download.title: Download and Installation
download.desc: Can't download or open the file? Unable to start iNZight? Try here!

download.title: Download Issues
download.desc: If you can't download iNZight, perhaps due to security isssues, try here. If you have iNZight downloaded but you can't get it to run, check the Installation sections.

linux.title: Linux Installation Issues
linux.desc: Note: installation of iNZight on Linux is very version-dependent. Google searching error messages might be your best hope …

import_data.title: Importing Data
import_data.desc: Having trouble importing your data into iNZight? We might have a solution for you.
